titleStmt.title: A sermon dedicatory Preached at the consecration of of the chapell of Epping in Essex, October, 28. 1622. By Ier. Dyke, minister there.
titleStmt.author: Dyke, Jeremiah, 1584-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] D[awson] for Nathanael Newbery, and are to be sold at his shop vnder Saint Peters Church in Cornehill, and in Popes-head Alley, at the signe of the Stare,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Popes-head Alley, at the signe of the Stare
his shop vnder Saint Peters Church in Cornehill
